text: JCO Clinical Cancer Informatics is an online peer-reviewed medical journal of oncology and medical informatics published by the American Society of Clinical Oncology (ASCO). The journal was established in 2017 and the editor-in-chief is Debra A. Patt (Texas Oncology). Articles are published upon acceptance and after 12 months become freely available. All ASCO special articles (e.g. clinical guidelines and policy statements), editorials, comments and controversies articles, and correspondence are freely available immediately upon publication. ==Abstracting and indexing== This journal is abstracted and indexed in: *Emerging Sources Citation Index *Index Medicus/MEDLINE/PubMed *Scopus ==See also== *Journal of Clinical Oncology ==References== ==External links== * Category:Oncology journals Category:Biomedical informatics journals Category:Delayed open access journals Category:English-language journals Category:Publications established in 2017 Category:Continuous journals Category:Hybrid open access journals
title: JCO Clinical Cancer Informatics
